org.critterai.nmgen
Interface IOpenHeightFieldAlgorithm

All Known Implementing Classes:
CleanNullRegionBorders, FilterOutSmallRegions
public interface IOpenHeightFieldAlgorithm

Applies an algorithm to an OpenHeightfield

The algorithm may require the field to be in a supported state. E.g. The regions must have been generated.

Method Summary
 void apply(OpenHeightfield field)
          Applies the algorithm to the height field.
 

Method Detail

apply

void apply(OpenHeightfield field)
Applies the algorithm to the height field.

Parameters:
field - The field to apply the algorithm to.
